ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Knowledge on French culture and language, I especially enjoyed the movies and discussion.

I was able to gain a refresher on the different grammatical tools of French and additional verb conjugation structure such as the subjunctive. I was able to read different literary works and have the proficiency to talk about and critique the.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Strengths: the content is very interesting ( I mean the selected books and movies), Madam Koundi is very clear in explaining materials and vocabulary

Strengths: LANGUAGE CLASSES ARE AMAZING!!!!! This is the one course I took this semester where I can actually say that I saw my improvement week by week and I am proud to be learning. I was also able to engage with literary works that were interesting and made me reflect upon my own life and how I see the world!!!
Weaknesses: I would say the only weakness is that when we go over answers to homework it is very easy for the professor to lean on the individuals on the class who know all the answers. Then it doesn't really feel like I'm there to learn but there to hear the best person in the class prove how much French they know. It then feels like the professor only wants to get through learning and not seeing each of our individual improvement. It only happened so often but when it did it wasn't so great.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes I would. if you want to actually learn language this class will get you there.
